Headline: Eastbound #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute near Cermak/Cicero
ShortDescription: Eastbound 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Cicero, 16th, Kostner, and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Cicero, 16th, Kostner, and Cermak due to, street blockage near Cermak/Cicero.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
